promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young basic rabbit steel-type pokemon with golden fur. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or rabbit. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Aurabun, a a young basic rabbit steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Metal Jail, Type Switch. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "rabbit", "steel" or "Aurabun". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, rabbit-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, metallic ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This nimble, metallic-hued hopper thrives in rocky terrain, using its Metal Jail ability to trap foes while Type Switch helps it adapt.
